adDetails: Founded in 2005, Nima Productions is one of the most experienced wedding and live event videography companies in California. Multiple videographers serve throughout San Francisco Bay Area and Sacramento. All of our videographers are Professionals, having gone through rigorous wedding and event training both in filming and in wedding editing. Nima Productions prides itself on its ability to remain on top of the industry. We dedicate all of our time and resources to the continuingly changing world of wedding video production. No extra charges anywhere in the bay area makes us a uniquely different production company. Nima Productions has filmed many cultural wedding ceremonies from Armenian to Indian, Chinese to Filipino and from Greek to Jewish. Please allow us to capture your most precious memories to treasure for a lifetime. We have different packages to fit different budgets. Book NOW and receive 25 percent off your selected package! Please visit our website: www.NimaProductions.com to view samples and different packages we offer. For more information please call show contact info New for the 2014 Wedding Season, we are introducing Nima Productions photography packages. We have experienced and amazing photographers who can be booked alone, or combined with a video package.
